name: Star Klondike
overview: Star Klondike (also Known as Loadstar's Klondike Solitaire) is a variation of Klondike solitaire for the Commodore 64. It was developed by John Serafino and published in Loadstar #138 in 1995. The game has several options, including the ability for drawing 1 or 3 cards, as well as the ability to play either a single-deck or a double-deck version of the game.
